function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Seroprevalence surveys suggesting higher infection rates than reported sars-cov-2 cases","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data collected during the initial testing period may be affected by the learning phase of individuals","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expansion to a drive-through environment introduces new time measures and operational differences","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Addition of new smartphones to digitalize a larger clinic introduces scalability and data management challenges.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mass vaccination process against covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High efficiency of the vaccination process","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long queue at the beginning of the day in the inoculation phase","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased flow of patients leading to crowded moments","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High utilization of doctors in the anamnesis control phase","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate optimization of healthcare systems can lead to increased risk of disease spread","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of simulation models in healthcare for testing alternate scenarios","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Importance of data collection for reliability of vaccination process","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of disease transmission in crowded spaces","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing investment in industry 4.0 technology due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Iot technologies for data collection and analysis during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical interaction with assembly line equipment and devices","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of disease transmission through shared touchpoints in the workplace environment","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate vaccination coverage leading to continued virus spread","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient mass vaccination infrastructure","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in implementing lockdown measures","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Logistic challenges in vaccine distribution","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of new variants and mutations","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of infectious disease spread in office environments due to design aspects.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 in office and factory premises","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in the regulatory environment","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of employee motivation to cooperate with covid-19 guidelines","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective administrative follow-up in covid-19 to fear of virus infection.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient source control measures leading to infectious spread in high-risk places","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcrowding and lack of ppe doffing control in office environments","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differing covid-19 guidelines across countries","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of
